DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal project develop sensitive objective clinical research tool assessment head-neck motor control . In order accomplish goal , investigator aim quantify change head-neck motor control osteopathic manipulative treatment . The investigator hypothesize head-neck motor control improve neck pain participant 4-weeks treatment . Additionally , investigator compare position force head-neck motor control healthy control neck pain patient . The investigator hypothesize baseline test position force head-neck motor control well healthy individual neck pain patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment Neuromuscular Control Head-neck System
DOC.criteria: All participant must meet inclusion criterion participate study . Below list inclusion criterion ALL participant : Age 2165 year Independently ambulatory Able speak read English Able understand study procedure comply entire length study . Below additional list inclusion criterion NECK PAIN participant : Willing randomize either immediate delayed treatment group . Musculoskeletal pain primarily cervical region lasting longer 3 month Pain rating great equal 3 10 indicated Numeric Rating Scale Pain Neck Disability great equal 30 % indicated Neck Disability Index All candidate meet exclusion criterion baseline exclude study participation . Exclusion criterion selfreported . However , treatment session , physicians watch clinical sign symptom consistent physical finding suggestive presence exclusion criterion . In case , treatment discontinue subject exclude . Below list exclusion criterion ALL participant : Inability unwillingness individual give write informed consent . Physical therapy form manual medicine ( e.g. , Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine , Chiropractic Manipulation , etc . ) , acupuncture spinal injection within one month prior study enrollment Workers ' compensation benefit past 3 month ongoing medical legal issue Possibly pregnant Extreme obesity ( BMI > 36 ) Currently use electrical implant ( e.g. , cardiac pacemaker , drug delivery pump , etc . ) History : Spinal surgery Spinal fracture Spinal infection ( e.g. , osteomyelitis ) Cancer Unresolved symptom : Head trauma Inner ear infection associate balance coordination problem Orthostatic hypotension Uncontrolled hypertension Vestibular disorder ( e.g . vertigo ) Current diagnosis : Significant spinal deformity ( e.g. , scoliosis > 20 degree , torticollis ) Ankylosing spondylitis Spondylolisthesis grade III IV Rheumatoid arthritis Osteoporosis Angina congestive heart failure symptom Active bleed infection back Blindness Seizures Neurologic disease ( e.g. , Parkinson 's disease , multiple sclerosis , cerebral palsy , Alzheimer 's disease , amyotrophic lateral sclerosis , stroke transient ischemic attack past year , cervical dystonia ) Conditions recognize physician time study : Significant worsening sign neurologic deficit Symptoms consistent mechanical finding Other condition impede protocol implementation Below additional exclusion criterion healthy control participant : â€¢ Based minimal clinically important difference 2 point ( Childs et al. , 2005 ) , `` healthy control '' 2 point great pain NRS eligible participate .
